attributes.action: Make ‘Hit and Run Drivers’ who Kill or Injure others LOSE their License.
attributes.additional_details:
Police Officers have died and been seriously injured, Children been Killed, these Drivers make our Roads Unsafe by their actions and are the Criminals of our Roads, No respect of the Laws including Police Officers doing their job, the amount of Funds from our Emergency Services.

Laws must be updated each year with Fines so they do NOT become Worthless as some are now and just a smack on the hand.

Please support this as it could be you or your child next.
attributes.background: As these Drivers are a Menace to others and cause our roads to be less safe depending on how Severe the Incident is, MUST lose Their License for a Minimum of FIVE years up to BANNED for good for Death or Serious Injury, they have no consideration for the ones left Dying or Badly Injured.
